4302390.name: The Last Child: Valdoria
4302390.description:
The kingdom that once united wizards and geniuses, alchemists and engineers has become a battleground between magic and technology. For centuries, mages ruled the top of the food chain, while the giftless were treated as little more than slaves. Stripped of magic, they forged machines and devices to survive—and began questioning if the kingdom deserved to exist at all.

But this isn't a tale of war or power. It's the story of a girl racing to the capital, while something ancient and mighty awaits her in the depths of an old castle.

The village of Roule was a quiet haven where mugs clinked, villagers laughed, and wandering musicians played enchanted instruments. Here lived Aliye — a girl whose life was about to shatter forever.
One day, darkness struck without warning. The first arrow pierced her mother's heart. No farewell. No chance for salvation.
Aliye runs — through thorny thickets, past burning homes, into a misty field. There, in the shadows, it waits—ravenous, alien, not of the living world.

The Last Child: Valdoria is an atmospheric 3D side-scrolling adventure crafted in a unique artistic style. Custom filters, soft lighting, and fluid color shifts make every moment feel like stepping into a living painting.

Explore Valdoria's forgotten continent, where nature cradles the ruins of a lost civilization. Discover mysterious locations, melancholic beauty, and a tale of hope, solitude, and growing up.
This isn't just a game—it's a visually captivating journey that lingers long after the credits roll.

Experience the depth and scale:

  • Talk to kingdom folk — uncover their stories, secrets, and hints.

  • Explore and observe — the world has its own rules. Study customs, locations, and enemy weaknesses.

  • Hide from threats — darkness teems with danger. Use cover, watch foes, and plan every step.

  • Solve puzzles — ancient mechanisms and lost secrets demand creative thinking. Help Aliye press on by revealing the kingdom's mysteries.

Can you guide Aliye along her fated path and uncover what awaits at Valdoria's heart? Dive into the rich world of The Last Child: Valdoria.
Add it to your wishlist to catch the latest news — and breathe in the magic with your first step into a new adventure.
